text: On deleting the message, there should not be any further options to choose from

We need to check how easy and self explanatory the process is to send a message and delete in the chat screen is. How is the user behaviour when they want to delete a message? Is it straightforward or does it feel like it has a learning curve?
The message should be sent successfully and the user should be able to see the message in the chat screen
The user should be able to select the message to delete from the chat screen
The user should be able to delete the message from the chat screen
The message should be deleted successfully and the user should be able to see the message in the chat screen
